en.title: Testimonial - Quantum Pendant
en.content:
Safee Sali, Malaysia National Football Team Striker.

 
SAFEE SALI ACHIEVEMENTS:

- Scored 16 goals during 2007/2008 Malaysian Super League Season.
- Scored 5 goals in International Matches since joining National Team in 2006.
- Collected 11 National Caps.

As a football striker FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant has really given me extra energy and had boosted my performance as well as elevate my confidence to score goals. Using this multi purpose pendant has also reduced my chances of getting injured and has healed old injuries in a short time. I can now play football for more than 120 minutes at a time without feeling too tired. Playing football is now more enjoyable with FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant. I would recommend this wonderful Quantum Pendant for everyone to use!
